experiences: Worked on Frontend Skills like HTML, CSS
Also worked on the javaScript and git/github to manage the code.
I developed a full-stack web application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a responsive and interactive frontend.
On the backend, I integrated AWS APIs for secure user data storage and fast login/signup functionality, while efficiently handling CORS to ensure smooth frontend–backend communication.

The project leverages Replicate APIs to generate text-to-video and image-to-video content, along with the Text-to-Video API by Digital Guruji for enhanced video generation. Overall, it’s a scalable, cloud-based platform combining intuitive design, robust authentication, and powerful AI-driven media creation
